page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: Most people have O and A Levels except the elderly. The highest number found being 10 O Levels and 7 A Levels. Most people gained their qualifications from universities and colleges, but some people gained them in night schools and basic education. The average age of school leavers is 16.5. This average was taken from two generations of people. The younger generation has more access to further education. A large majority thought the local Grammar Schools should not be abolished but others thought that everyone should have equal education. The majority thought that schools should have corporal punishment and homework should be set. 50% of people think that local schools do a good job.
